Do you love tower defense games? If yes, then you must try Bloons TD 6. It's the sixth installment of the popular Bloons TD series developed by Ninja Kiwi. This game comes with new towers and exciting features that will keep you hooked.

## Overview

Bloons TD 6 is a tower defense game in which your objective is to stop the balloons (or Bloons) from getting to the end of the path. You have to strategically place towers along the path to pop these balloons before they reach the end. With each popped balloon, you earn money and can use it to buy more towers.

This game has many levels, and each level has a different path and difficulty level. As you progress through the levels, the game becomes more challenging.

## Towers

Bloons TD 6 has plenty of towers, and each one has its own unique abilities. Some towers are good at shooting multiple balloons at once, while others are best for targeting specific balloons. The game allows you to upgrade your towers as well, making them more powerful as you progress.

## Features

Bloons TD 6 comes with several new features that make the game even more exciting. These features include:

- New towers: There are 21 towers in Bloons TD 6, including new ones like the Druid and Alchemist.
- Heroes: You can now choose from a selection of heroes to help you defend against the Bloons. Each hero has its own unique abilities.
- Strategies: Bloons TD 6 requires strategic thinking, as each level has a different path and difficulty level. You must use different towers and upgrade them wisely to defeat the Bloons.
- Skins: You can now customize your towers with different skins, making the game even more fun.

## Conclusion

Bloons TD 6 is a fun and addictive game suitable for all ages. It comes with new towers, heroes, and skins that make the game even more exciting than its predecessors. With hundreds of levels, this game will keep you entertained for hours. Download Bloons TD 6 today and start popping those Bloons!
